name: clinical-toolkit
description: Claude skill framework for clinical mental health screening, assessment interpretation, and documentation support
author: rhavekost

skills.name: depression-screening
skills.description: Depression screening and assessment using PHQ-9 and PHQ-2 instruments

skills.name: anxiety-screening
skills.description: Anxiety screening and assessment using GAD-7 and GAD-2 instruments

skills.name: trauma-screening
skills.description: PTSD and trauma screening using PC-PTSD-5 and PCL-5 assessments

skills.name: substance-screening
skills.description: Substance use screening using AUDIT-C (alcohol) and DAST-10 (drugs) assessments

skills.name: suicide-screening
skills.description: Suicide risk screening using C-SSRS (Columbia Protocol) and ASQ (Ask Suicide-Screening Questions)

skills.name: intake-interview
skills.description: Structured interview guides: HEADSS assessment, biopsychosocial template, safety protocols

skills.name: treatment-planning
skills.description: Treatment planning using SMART goals framework, level of care guidance, measurement-based care

skills.name: documentation
skills.description: Clinical documentation templates: SOAP notes, progress notes, treatment plans
